tasks.title: Implement FastMCP Tool Annotations for Enterprise Security Tools
tasks.description: Based on comprehensive TypeScript research, implement missing FastMCP tool annotations for high-priority enterprise security tools including zero-trust-auth.ts, multi-tenant-security.ts, and enterprise-secrets.ts. Add complete annotations with proper titles, readOnlyHint, destructiveHint, idempotentHint, and openWorldHint properties following established patterns.
success_criteria: All enterprise security tools have complete FastMCP annotations
Annotations follow established patterns from research
Security tools properly marked with destructiveHint where appropriate
External API interactions marked with openWorldHint
All tools have descriptive titles for UI enhancement
